html: rising of the sun/west. These two lines denote that Jehovah is the God of the whole earth and will yet be known as such. Revealing Jehovah to all nations is part of the peculiar mission of Israel (42:1-4, 6-8), and we of the Church are latter-day Israel. This prophecy is similar to the one made by Malachi: "For from the rising of the sun even unto the going down of the same my name shall be great among the Gentiles;…for my name shall be great among the heathen, saith the Lord of hosts" (Mal. 1:11).
